model.name: Double Face Long Wrap Coat
model.disambiguatingDescription: This timeless long wrap coat is cut from a warm and soft double face wool-silk blend in a spirited seasonal shade. Wide lapels add a smart, structured touch to the streamlined silhouette, complete with practical pockets and a lengthy belt that defines a feminine waistline. The inside is discreetly signed with a tonal Monogram jacquard.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 99% Wool, 1% Silk
  • Other Material : 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
  • Lining : 53% Viscose, 47% Cupro
  • Pastel Yellow
  • Regular fit
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons

model.color: ジョーヌ パステル
